instruction: Identify a quote from a text and explain its significance.
output: One of the most memorable quotes from the Harry Potter series is, "Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light." This quote from Professor Dumbledore illustrates how, even in the most difficult times, we can find inner peace and hope. It serves as a reminder to stay strong and remain optimistic, no matter the circumstances.
